testcase.name: ConsumerUser validate Debit Card when user activates a valid card returns success status
ConsumerUser validate Debit Card when user activates an invalid card returns card activation failure message

FinPlat validate Debit Transaction when user with sufficient balance through cash-load swipes debit card at the merchant returns success for swipe, checking balance and transaction history are updated

testcase.name: Server-API validate Account Info graphql queries/mutations when user settings info query is called returns correct user settings
Server-API validate Account Info graphql queries/mutations when update user settings mutation to disable a setting is called returns correct updated user settings
Server-API validate Account Info graphql queries/mutations when update user settings mutation to enable a setting is called returns correct updated user settings
Server-API validate Account Info graphql queries/mutations when update user settings card mutation to disable card transactions is called chime_card_transactions is disabled
